Desenvolvedora lixo e jogo ruim... Mas depois que você se acostuma fica bom.

This is a good game in concept that becomes increasingly stale and frustrating at higher ranks given the overwhelming use of specific perks (character add-ons that grant abilities to the unfamiliar). 

This game can ONLY be viable long-term if the designers implement the ability to "draft" perks. By this, I mean each survivor should be allowed to restrict one perk to the killer for the match and the killer should disallow four perks for the match. 

"But wait," you might say. "That means I wouldn't get to ever play Dead Hard, Borrowed Time, BBQ & Chili, Ruin, No One Escapes Death, etc." Yes. It would mean that. You might find yourself enjoying the game more if you encounter things that are new and unexpected. Overused perks and toxic perk builds lead to toxic gameplay. If you don't want to remove toxicity, you're part of the problem. 

I do not recommend this game because this change will never happen. The developers have proven incredibly resistant to assisting with hostility in the player base.

Das Spiel macht viel Spaß, hat sehr viel Potenzial, besonders mit Freunden kann man sehr viel Zeit in Dead by Daylight verbringen. Vor allem die ganzen Lizenzen machen das Spiel zu einer Art Zusammenschluss von vielen coolen und bekannten Figuren, die man aus verschiedenen Filmen und Videospielen kennt. Leider muss gesagt werden, dass das Spiel sehr unausgeglichen ist, oft einige Bugs hat und die Community sehr salzig werden kann...

Would i recommend this game? Absolutley not. This is one of the most toxic game there is. Survivors are assholes that does not help eachother. And if they do help you you have been very lucky because that is rare. Killers camp and tunnel you so hard that you whish you weren't born. This game is only meant for you to become so sick and tired of others that you want to end humanity for good. It doesn't matter if you play survivor or killer, you will meet shitheads anyway. They feed on making you miserable. I'm sooooooo close on uninstalling this game because it is not the game it once was. Once it was a nice game but now it is just toxic assholes that play this game. It is not fun anymore, this game needs to be fixed in some way but that is most likely not going to happen. Save your sanity and your money, don't buy this game!!!

Hello,
Thank you for taking the time to reach out to the Dead by Daylight Team.
The disconnect penalty system is completely automated and for that reason, we do not offer appeals.
You can read more about The Dead by Daylight disconnect penalty system [here](https://forum.deadbydaylight.com/en/discussion/128722/). 
We apologize for the frustration this has caused you.
See you in the fog soon.

The Dead by Daylight Team

good game

While this game has a huge place in my heart, I wouldn't consider myself a truly active player. I drift in and out with occasional bursts of play time. 

But I don't believe this game is something you can play short term. It takes time and effort to enjoy, and while at the start it felt like the only way to enjoy the game is to win. Later on, I've grown to appreciate the less competitive side of this game where messing around and being a little toxic makes up most of my time. 

Not toxic to the point of slinging racial slurs, waiting out timer at the gates to tbag, or face camping in basement. But good hearted cat and mouse style gameplay. Which is what the game should be.

Taking it too seriously, worrying about rank and perfect perk builds. It drains the fun out of the content, and it skews the fun of the game by making boring and repetitive matches. 

That's why we complain about balance. That's why we complain about bugs. Because as soon as these trickles of power fall into the hands of sweaty, angry, and truly toxic players. You will be subjected to them over and over again. Especially in higher MMR.

Playing the game seriously and competitively will take out all of the fun and excitement you expect to get out of it's gameplay. At least it does for me. 

Don't play too well if you want to enjoy more frequent laidback games. Play really well if you want to play the highest ranked Nurse, Spirit, and Blight clones back to back.
